com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.helpers

Class SCUILoginPageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.helpers.SCUILoginPageHelper

  • public class SCUILoginPageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which instantiates and manages login page providers which have been plugged-in. The helper maintains SCUILoginPageProvider per application and can be invoked by providing the current UI context.

    How to plug-in through web.xml: 
       <context-param>
       <param-name>scui-login-page-provider</param-name>
       <param-value>com.sterlingcommerce.application.AppLoginPageProvider</param-value>
   </context-param>
    SCUIAuthenticationProvider rasrinivasan

      static ISCUILoginPageProvider getLoginPageProvider(SCUIContext uiContext)
      Utility method to get the plugged-in login page provider based on the current context uiContext The current UI context The plugged-in login page provider or null if not found
      static ISCUILoginPageProvider getLoginPageProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Utility method to get the plugged-in login page provider based on the current servlet context servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext The plugged-in login page provider or null if not found
      static ISCUILoginPageProvider getLoginPageProvider(java.lang.String applicationId)
      Utility method to get the plugged-in guest user provider based on the current applicationId applicationId is the unique identifier for an application.
      static ISCUILoginPageProvider loadLoginPageProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Loads the plugged-in login page provider based on the servlet context servletContext The servlet context for which the login page provider needs to be loaded The plugged-in login page provider or null if not found
